mapper.sql: id, pid, text, type, state, sort, mid, closeable, href, code, description
mapper.select: SELECT id, text, href, code FROM sys_permission p LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT r.pid FROM role_permission r WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM user_role u WHERE u.uid=#{userId} AND r.rid=u.rid )) a ON p.id=a.pid
SELECT id AS tid,mid AS id,text,href,closeable FROM sys_permission WHERE pid=#{pid} AND type=0 AND state=0 ORDER BY sort
SELECT id,pid AS pId,text AS name FROM sys_permission WHERE pid=#{pid} AND type=0 AND state=0 ORDER BY sort
